title: Survey Creation Mandatory Company Selection Validation
description: Ensure that survey creation is blocked if no company is selected and the appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the survey creation page
Attempt to proceed without selecting a company
Verify that survey creation cannot proceed
Verify that a clear error message indicating company selection requirement is displayed

title: Question Library Side-by-Side ES/EN Editing and Version Control
description: Validate question library supports side-by-side Spanish and English content editing, versioning, and prevents duplication.

steps.description: Open the question library management interface
Create a new question with Spanish and English text side-by-side
Save the question and verify versioning is tracked
Attempt to add a duplicate question text
Verify duplicate addition is prevented with an appropriate notification

title: Targeting Pre-Load and CSV/XLSX Import Validations
description: Test pre-loading of departments, users, demographics upon company selection and import of CSV/XLSX with correct column mapping and duplicate detection.

steps.description: Select a company in the targeting section
Verify departments, users, and demographics are pre-loaded accurately
Import a demographic CSV/XLSX file with correct mapping
Verify data is imported successfully and duplicates are detected and reported

title: Survey Scheduling Timezone-Aware Validation
description: Ensure survey scheduling enforces valid start/end date and time with timezone awareness and restricts access outside these windows except for admin override.

steps.description: Set survey start and end date/time with timezones
Verify scheduling rejects invalid ranges
Access survey before start time as an employee
Verify access is denied
Access survey before start time as admin
Verify access is permitted due to override

title: Distribution Generates Unique Tokenized URLs and QR Codes with Access Control
description: Verify survey distribution generates unique URLs and QR codes which respect scheduling windows and role-based access permissions.

steps.description: Distribute a scheduled survey via generated URL and QR code
Verify URL and QR code are unique and valid
Attempt to access the survey outside the schedule window
Verify access is denied for unauthorized roles

title: Autosave and Draft Recovery for Survey Creation and Response Submission
description: Validate that survey forms autosave every 5-10 seconds and on field blur, and that drafts are recoverable after session expiration or disconnect.

steps.description: Begin creating or responding to a survey
Modify input and wait for autosave interval
Verify data is saved automatically
Simulate session disconnect or expiration
Reload or re-enter survey page
Verify autosaved draft is recovered correctly

title: Company Creation Validations Against Domain Duplicates
description: Test company creation rejects domain duplicates and displays clear, actionable errors.

steps.description: Attempt to create a new company with an existing domain
Verify creation is blocked and clear error message is shown

title: Email Domain Field Validation and Normalization Hint
description: Ensure email domain fields accept only domains and provide normalization hints for full email inputs.

steps.description: Input a full email into the email domain field
Verify normalization hint is displayed instructing to enter domain only
Input a proper domain and submit
Verify domain is accepted successfully

title: Role-Based Access Control Strict Enforcement and Dynamic Updates
description: Verify role-based permissions are strictly enforced on UI and APIs, and dynamic role changes reflect immediately without delay.

steps.description: Login as each role and verify access scopes on UI and API calls
Confirm access is limited to allowed resources only
Change role of a user during session
Verify permission changes apply dynamically without logout/login

title: Multilingual ES/EN Content Display with Preview and Export Without Missing Translations
description: Test bilingual UI displaying side-by-side English and Spanish content, including preview and exporting with no untranslated strings.

steps.description: Switch between English and Spanish in UI
Verify all UI components and content toggle correctly with side-by-side editing
Export content to PDF/Excel
Verify no missing translations or untranslated placeholders present in exports

title: Telemetry Captures User Events and Error Tracking
description: Validate that user journey events, errors, and abandonment rates are captured correctly in telemetry for analytics.

steps.description: Perform a defined user flow with typical interactions
Simulate errors and abandonment points
Verify telemetry logs events, errors, and abandonment data accurately

title: Microclimate Session Anonymous Participation and Live Data Visualization
description: Ensure microclimate sessions permit anonymous participation, display live word clouds and animated charts, and support data export.

steps.description: Launch a microclimate session as an admin
Access session as anonymous participant
Verify participation is allowed without login
Confirm live word clouds and animated charts update in real-time
Export session data
Verify export files generate correctly with all participation data

title: Audit Logs Record Changes with User ID, Timestamp and Details
description: Verify audit trail logging captures all system changes with accurate user identification, timestamps, and detailed change records.

steps.description: Perform various create, update, and delete actions on critical entities (users, surveys, companies, roles)
Verify audit logs record each action with user ID, timestamp, entity affected, and change details

title: GDPR Compliance: Data Access and Erasure Requests
description: Test that GDPR compliance features correctly process user data access requests and data erasure with proper logging.

steps.description: Submit user data access request
Verify user data package is generated and delivered correctly
Submit data erasure (right to be forgotten) request
Verify personal data is erased and operation is logged with timestamp and user ID

title: Performance Test for Large Target Sets in Survey Steps
description: Ensure that survey creation and participant selection UI remains responsive with over 1000 targets, loads under 2 seconds, and has no UI overlaps or freezes.

steps.description: Load targeting step with 1000+ users and demographic targets
Measure load time and confirm it is less than 2 seconds
Verify UI elements do not overlap and remain fully interactive

title: Authentication Success and Failure with Multiple Methods
description: Test user login via SSO and email/password flows including valid and invalid credentials scenarios.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Login using valid email and password
Confirm successful login and landing on role-based dashboard
Attempt login using invalid credentials
Confirm login failure with proper error message
Login using configured SSO provider
Confirm successful SSO login and role assignment

title: Real-Time Dashboard Data Update and Export
description: Verify that role-based dashboards update data in real-time and support export/share functionality without errors.

steps.description: Login as various roles including super_admin, company_admin, department_admin, and employee
Verify role-specific data and KPIs displayed on dashboards
Trigger data changes (e.g., survey responses) and observe dashboard updates
Verify real-time data refresh without manual reload
Export dashboard data reports to PDF/Excel
Confirm exports complete successfully and data integrity is maintained

title: Action Plan Creation, KPI Tracking, and Alerts Workflow
description: Validate creation of action plans from survey insights, assignment of owners, KPI tracking, progress updates, and overdue alerts.

steps.description: Create an action plan from survey insight data
Assign action owners and define SMART KPIs
Verify action plan and KPIs are saved and displayed on dashboards
Simulate progress updates and overdue status
Verify alerts and notifications are generated accurately

title: AI Analytics Semantic Analysis, Sentiment Scoring and Adaptive Question Selection
description: Test AI analytics engine processes survey responses with semantic and sentiment analysis accurately and adapts question flow based on results.

steps.description: Submit survey responses with varied sentiment and semantic content
Verify AI generates correct sentiment scores and identifies semantic patterns
Verify adaptive questions appear based on AI insights

title: Internationalization: Locale Routing and Language Switching Consistency
description: Validate bilingual English and Spanish UI with correct locale-based routing, language switching, and message translations consistency.

steps.description: Access platform with English locale URL and then switch to Spanish
Verify URL routing updates to Spanish locale path
Verify all visible text content switches language accordingly
Access platform directly via Spanish locale URL
Verify UI loads in Spanish with no fallback to English strings
